question:
Which among the following are correct about the Kothari Commission?
1. It was constituted in 1964
2. Daulat Singh Kothari was the chairman of the commission
3. It suggested compulsory education up to the age of 14
4. It also focused on the Agriculture education
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Kothari Commission was appointed in the year 1964 with the chairmanship of Daulat Singh Kothari. It suggested compulsory education upto the age of 14 and focused on Agriculture education.
